title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3818/86 of 15 December 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3818/86
of 15 December 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2042/75 (3) ia amended as follows:
Table A of Annex II is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
